author: UnclaimedBloom6
changelog: Option to show black borders around player icons like SBA's map.
Added percentages to rooms and puzzles in /dlogs command.
Added ability to change map scale via the "Move Map" gui by scrolling (Buggy) - thanks iTqxic.
Upon closing the move GUIs for the map & score calc the config gui will re-open automatically.
Dead players will still have their skins shown, just with a cross over their faces.
Changed "% of needed" to show the minimum amount of secrets to get S+ instead (Counts Paul, crypts, deaths).
